title: Splugen Brau Lamp
body: Drawing inspiration from the beehive, which symbolizes energy and productivity, Achille Castiglioni designed the Splugen Brau Lamp in 1961. The distinctive corrugated shape of the polished aluminium reflector, which omits a bright, fresh, direct light suitable for people leading busy modern lives. Simple yet surprising, eye-catching without being overpowering, it is a great choice for customers putting together an upbeat, eclectic interior décor design for their home or workplace.
